haibison.android.lockpattern.util

Class LoadingDialog<Params,Progress,Result>

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.os.AsyncTask<Params,Progress,Result>
      • haibison.android.lockpattern.util.LoadingDialog<Params,Progress,Result>

  • public abstract class LoadingDialog<Params,Progress,Result>
extends AsyncTask<Params,Progress,Result>
    An implementation of AsyncTask, used to show ProgressDialog while doing some background tasks.
    Author:
    Hai Bison
